abilities.name: Advanced Telepathy.
abilities.description: The flumph can perceive the content of any telepathic communication used within 60 feet of it, and it can't be surprised by creatures with any form of telepathy.

abilities.name: Prone Deficiency.
abilities.description: If the flumph is knocked prone, roll a die. On an odd result, the flumph lands upside-down and is incapacitated. At the end of each of its turns, the flumph can make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, righting itself and ending the incapacitated condition if it succeeds.

abilities.name: Telepathic Shroud.
abilities.description: The flumph is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as all divination spells.
